name: Dark Nova
description:

"If your eyes light up when you hear the word "Elite" in a non-Xbox 360 setting, go buy Dark Nova right now." --gamesradar

***** "Awesome - Completely addicting game. It's really fun to engage in lifelike trading with a space twist."

***** "Get This Game! - I can not explain to you how much I love this game. It uses little battery, doesn't need wifi, and it's addicting!"

***** "Brilliant - Excellent space trader executed with wit and style. I've sunk hours into it already."

This is an old school RPG experience! This game has depth and many hours of entertainment. This is not a mindless shooter!

Dark Nova is the essential single-player role-playing game we’ve all been waiting for on the iPhone. A real-time expansive universe consisting of over 100 star systems, each with many planetary bodies make this a game that you don’t master in short order. Buy and sell goods between star systems, make a profit and try to avoid the Police along the way...if you can. Become a trader, a pirate, or a mercenary for hire. There’s a market for all professions.

Classic SciFi RPG style play. 100's of hours of entertainment. Design your character then work your way up from a small fragile ship to a juggernaut brimming with weapons and gadgets.

Dark Nova is the highly anticipated conversion of the classic Palm Pilot game “Space Trader” for the iPhone. A complete and total graphical overhaul and game flow/design update. Visually stunning graphics, a luscious soundtrack, and an unbeatable auto-saving mechanism make this the game we’ve all been waiting for. Be the first space cadet on the block to get it.

Go on mysterious quests and adventures. With elements from SciFi classics like Elite, Star Control, Privateer, Sundog, Starflight, Trade Wars, Freelancer, and more!

Got an escape pod? You'll need it rookie!
